text: Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao zhuisui emo de bufa. Shei zhuisui emo de bufa, emo bi mingling shei gan choushi he fan zuixing. Ruofei zhenzhu suo ci nimen de enhui he renci, zhu yongyuan bu shi nimen zhong de renhe ren qingbai. Dan zhenzhu shi tasuo yiyu zhe qingbai. Zhenzhu shi quan cong de, shi quanzhi de
